title: Pieri-type multiplication formula for quantum Grothendieck polynomials. (arXiv:2211.01578v1 [math.QA])
description: The purpose of this paper is to prove a Pieri-type multiplication formula for quantum Grothendieck polynomials, which was conjectured by Lenart-Maeno. Since the quantum Grothendieck polynomials have turned out to represent the corresponding (opposite) Schubert classes in the (small) quantum $K$-theory $QK(Fl_{n})$ of the full flag manifold $Fl_{n}$ of type $A_{n-1}$ by our previous result, this formula enables us to compute explicitly the quantum product of two arbitrary (opposite) Schubert classes in $QK(Fl_{n})$.
